Package io.github.annabeths.Colleges

Class PlayerCollege

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.github.annabeths.GameGenerics.GameObject
      • io.github.annabeths.GameGenerics.PhysicsObject
        • io.github.annabeths.Colleges.College
          • io.github.annabeths.Colleges.PlayerCollege
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IHealth
    public class PlayerCollege
extends College
    A friendly College that heals the player and allows them to buy upgrades with plunder. When an EnemyCollege is destroyed it is "captured" and becomes a PlayerCollege.
    'Updated:'
    Assessment 2

    • Constructor Detail

      • PlayerCollege

        public PlayerCollege​(EnemyCollege oldCol)
        Creates a PlayerCollege based on an EnemyCollege. Used for when an enemy college is captured and converted into a player college.
        Parameters:
        oldCol - the enemy college to use as a base

      • PlayerCollege

        public PlayerCollege​(com.badlogic.gdx.math.Vector2 position,
                     java.lang.String aliveTexture,
                     java.lang.String islandTexture,
                     GameController gc,
                     boolean showSplashText)
        Constructor for PlayerCollege.
        Parameters:
        position - position for the new college
        aliveTexture - texture of the college
        islandTexture - texture of the island beneath the college
        gc - instance of GameController
        showSplashText - boolean that determines whether to display the text "College Captured!"

      • OnCollision

        public void OnCollision​(PhysicsObject ignored)
        PlayerCollege doesn't need to handle any collisions itself. The case of the PlayerBoat crashing into it is handled in the PlayerBoat class.
        Specified by:
        OnCollision in class PhysicsObject
        Parameters:
        ignored - n/a
        See Also:
        PlayerBoat.OnCollision(PhysicsObject)

      • checkForSpawnFriendlyBoat

        public void checkForSpawnFriendlyBoat​(float delta)
        Checks if a friendly boat should spawn. If it should spawn a friendly boat, a new FriendlyBoat object will be created in the GameController.
        Parameters:
        delta - the time elapsed since the last update

        Parameters:
        batch - the SpriteBatch to draw the college's sprite
